Html:
Hi,

I'm currently using VB 2005 and when i use the touchless dll libraries, i get an error while declaring the camera. For:

 

 Public Touchless As New TouchlessLib.TouchlessMgr
    Public Camera1 As TouchlessLib.Camera = Touchless.Cameras.ElementAt(0)

I get the error:  'ElementAt is not a member of 'System.collection.Generic.ILi­st(Of touchlessLib.Camera). Any clue how i could work this out? As i'm new, i'm not too sure of this. Please let me know.

Thanks!
i am also having a similar problem at "Dim Camera1 As TouchlessLib.Camera = Touchless.Cameras.ElementAt(0)" hope someone helps
